_sText:
**fy_mysterium**
==================
I decided to re-upload an old gungame map of mine. Only this time I added a buyzone and renamed it. This map took my quite alot of time to make. I feel it didn't earn enough downloads the first attempt. All the textures I used are made by myself. In the middle of the map is a spinning ventilator which can be used to get to the other side of the map faster.

**HAVE FUN !**
**Features**
==================
- Custom Textures
- Rotating Fan
- Rope Bridge
- HDR
- Soundscape
- Overview (Minimap) 
- Custom Skybox 
- **OPTIMISATION** 

Installation
==================
To install this map just copy the .bsp file inside the map to: \Steam\steamapps\STEAM USER ID\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps\
